00027 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 #ifndef __HT32_BOARD_CONFIG_H
00029 #define __HT32_BOARD_CONFIG_H
00030 
00031 #ifdef __cplusplus
00032  extern "C" {
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 
00036 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #if defined(USE_HT32F59041_SK)
00038   #define _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIOX                      B
00039   #define _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION                      2
00040 
00041   #define HTCFG_I2CM_CH0                          I2C0
00042   #define HTCFG_M0_SCL_GPIO_PORT                  B
00043   #define HTCFG_M0_SCL_GPIO_PIN                   0
00044   #define HTCFG_M0_SDA_GPIO_PORT                  B
00045   #define HTCFG_M0_SDA_GPIO_PIN                   1
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #if defined(USE_HT32F59741_SK)
00049   #define _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIOX                      A
00050   #define _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION                      14
00051 
00052   #define HTCFG_I2CM_CH0                          I2C0
00053   #define HTCFG_M0_SCL_GPIO_PORT                  B
00054   #define HTCFG_M0_SCL_GPIO_PIN                   0
00055   #define HTCFG_M0_SDA_GPIO_PORT                  B
00056   #define HTCFG_M0_SDA_GPIO_PIN                   1
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_CK                       STRCAT2(P,              _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIOX)
00060 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_ID                       STRCAT2(GPIO_P,         _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIOX)
00061 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_AFIO_PIN                      STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_,      _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION)
00062 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_PORT                     STRCAT2(HT_GPIO,        _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIOX)
00063 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_PIN                      STRCAT2(GPIO_PIN_,      _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION)
00064 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_AFIO_EXTI_CH                  STRCAT2(AFIO_EXTI_CH_,  _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION)
00065 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_AFIO_ESS                      STRCAT2(AFIO_ESS_P,     _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIOX)
00066 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_EXTI_CHANNEL                  STRCAT2(EXTI_CHANNEL_,  _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION)
00067 
00068 #if _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION < 2
00069 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_EXTI_IRQn                     EXTI0_1_IRQn
00070 #define DRDYB_EXTI_IRQHandler                     EXTI0_1_IRQHandler
00071 #elif _HTCFG_DRDYB_GPION < 4
00072 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_EXTI_IRQn                     EXTI2_3_IRQn
00073 #define DRDYB_EXTI_IRQHandler                     EXTI2_3_IRQHandler
00074 #else
00075 #define HTCFG_DRDYB_EXTI_IRQn                     EXTI4_15_IRQn
00076 #define DRDYB_EXTI_IRQHandler                     EXTI4_15_IRQHandler
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 
00080 #ifdef __cplusplus
00081 }
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #endif
